/*import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import "./BookList.css"; const Book = (book) => { return (
{book.title}
Author: {book.author.join(", ")}
Total Editions: {book.edition_count}
First Publish Year: {book.first_publish_year}
) } export default Book*/ import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./BookList.css"; const Book = (book) => { return (
{book.title}
Author: {book.author}
Total Editions: {book.edition_count}
First Publish Year: {book.first_publish_year}
); }; export default Book;
